channel.title: Mission Generator News
channel.description: News for the Mission Generator plugin for X-Plane

item.title: Getting the Mission Generator ready for release
item.description:
As far as I can tell, all major bugs in the Mission Generator have now been fixed. Now, all that remains is to get this website up and running, and getting the plugin listed on the X-Plane.org Store.

This is very exciting, since I have never done a commercial project before, and don't know what to expect!
